description: The CMS IPBS PUFs are aggregated files in which each record summarizes information for a particular institutional provider. An institutional provider refers to a hospital, a critical care facility, a skilled nursing facility, a home health agency or hospice or another similar institution providing services to Medicare beneficiaries. Information about individual beneficiaries is not reported.
keyword: Publically Available Data File - for download
title: Institutional Provider and Beneficiary Summary PUF
